repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

commit.message: Build: Attach current changelog to package description.
Build: Include the complete changelog of all pre-releases in the final release wheel.
Build: Also include referenced versions ("includes all fixes from") in the wheel changelog.
Build: Add a check that the wheel metadata contains the changelog.
Work around false positive in codespell.

milestone.description:
* Remove code for Python 2 and Python < 3.8.
* Integrate better with Python 3.
* Improve support for the Limited API.
* Start supporting GIL-free Python 3.13.
* Support the Py3.13 `sys.monitoring` API.
* Support and use `am_send` for coroutines.

title: Build: Attach current changelog to package description
